column1: Flow ID,Name,Description,Test Steps,Flow Priority

1,Navigate and Configure Git Repository Settings in SauceDemo,Navigate through the organization and team project settings to configure Git repository options and verify the home page.,"Step 1: Navigate to organization/*/home
Step 2: Click on button katalonOnKatalon
Step 3: Click on link organizationHome
Step 4: Click on link qequalityEngineers -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*'
Step 5: Click on link teamSettings -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/settings'
Step 6: Click on link scriptRepositories -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-project'
Step 7: Click on link connectGitRepository -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/git-test-project/setup'
Step 8: Click on header gitSetUpUseSample
Step 9: Click on header gitSetUpCreateNew
Step 10: Login -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-project'
Step 11: Click on link cloudianAutomation -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-project/*'
Step 12: Click on button edit -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-project/*/git/edit'
Step 13: Click on link documentation -> Navigate to page ''
Step 14: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

,High
2,Refresh Script Repository in Team Project Settings,Access team project settings, refresh the script repository, and verify the home page to ensure updates are reflected.","Step 1: Navigate to team/*/project/*
Step 2: Click on link teamSettings -> Navigate to page '/team/262587/project/375002/settings'
Step 3: Click on link teamScriptRepositories -> Navigate to page '/team/262587/project/375002/test-project'
Step 4: Click on link teamDemoBulkOperation -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-project/*'
Step 5: Click on button refreshScriptRepository -> Navigate to page ''
Step 6: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

,Medium
3,Schedule Test Run Configuration in SauceDemo for Team Project,Schedule a test run in SauceDemo, configure its settings, and verify navigation back to the home page.","Step 1: Navigate to team/*/project/*/grid
Step 2: Schedule a test run and configure its settings in SauceDemo

column2: - Step 3: Enter input value in input name
- Step 7: Enter input value in textarea katalonCommand

column1: Step 3: Click on link teamTestRunTsc -> Navigate to page '/team/262587/project/375002/grid/plan/270228/job'
Step 4: Click on link teamExecutions -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/executions/*'
Step 5: Click on link teamProjectGridPlanJob -> Navigate to page ''
Step 6: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

,Medium

6,Import and Schedule Test Run from Script Repository in SauceDemo,Navigate to team project settings, import a script repository, and schedule a test run while verifying the home page.","Step 1: Navigate to team/*/project/*
Step 2: Click on link teamSettings -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/settings'
Step 3: Click on link scriptRepositories -> Navigate to page '/team/320312/project/434641/test-project'
Step 4: Click on button typeAll
Step 5: Click on link teamImportScriptRepository
Step 6: Click on link teamZipRepo -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-project/*'
Step 7: Click on button edit
Step 8: Click on button refreshScriptRepository
Step 9: Click on button cancel
Step 10: Click on button scheduleTestRun -> Navigate to page '/team/320312/project/434641/test-planning'
Step 11: Click on button closeDialog
Step 12: Click on link teamSchedules -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/grid'
Step 13: Click on button scriptRepositoryAll -> Navigate to page ''
Step 14: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

,Medium
7,Access User Settings and Verify API Key in SauceDemo,Navigate to user settings to access and verify the Katalon API key, ensuring successful navigation back to the home page.","Step 1: Navigate to organization/*/home
Step 2: Click on button qa
Step 3: Click on link userSettings -> Navigate to page 'user/settings'
Step 4: Click on link katalonApikey -> Navigate to page ''
Step 5: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
,Medium
